lead_paragraph: A Brooklyn building that got off to a rough start with neighbors has begun leasing.

headline.main: A Very Tall Rental in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens

snippet: A Brooklyn building that got off to a rough start with neighbors has begun leasing....
abstract: Parkline, 23-story rental complex in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn, begins welcoming tenants, prevailing over community activists who objected to its height and tried to stop its construction in 2013; Hudson Companies development near Prospect Park was financed with state housing bonds and has 51 apartments set aside for lower-income renters.
